title: Border, late 16th–early 17th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: grid of laid cords with needle lace (reticella style)
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Border of square compartments filled with repeated floral form and edged with narrow border of zigzag design at either side.
